Fighting the "Not invented here" syndrome gets really hard when looking for a privacy sensitive live chat solution.
Only @userlike is hosted in Germany. Self-hosted livezilla requires a Windows installler (WTF!). Building a simple solution will take a day.
@userlike I've read your ToS and privacy statement. If you have more, I'd like to see that.
@userlike what I didn't find is a description of the user data that is transferred chatting. This is incomplete: https://t.co/3ABn0u49k4
@mortzu I'm talking about live chat on the website. Not group chat.
@mortzu Our customers don't have XMMP accounts.
@mortzu Sorry, I meant website visitors.
@creditshelf Agree! Startups must pay top salary to compete with "regular" employers like banks and body leasers if they want top talent.
@jcopkode @mortzu Thanks for clarification!

"Die Zukunft geh√∂rt den Geeks"
